590.sl_source: Prebrati klasično delo, na primer, ali zapeti pesem, ki vam je všeč.
590.en_source: For example, read a work of classic literature or sing a song you really like.
590.sl_trans: Na primer preberite klasično književno delo ali zapojete pesem, ki vam je zelo všeč.

591.sl_source: Nespametno bi bilo izbrati sprehod v naravi, na primer, ali spolni odnos z drugo osebo, ker te reči lahko počnete kot žival.
591.en_source: It would be silly to choose for example a walk in the grounds, or to have sexual intercourse with another person, because those are things you can do as an animal.
591.sl_trans: Bilo bi neumno, če bi se na primer odločili za sprehod po okolici ali spolni odnos z drugo osebo, saj so to stvari, ki jih lahko počnete kot žival.

592.sl_source: Najprej pa, vaša najboljša prijateljica je nekaj napisala in vam želi prebrati.
592.en_source: But first your best friend has written something she'd like to read to you.
592.sl_trans: Toda najprej je tvoja najboljša prijateljica napisala nekaj, kar bi ti rada prebrala.

594.sl_source: V šoli sva vedno sedeli skupaj.

595.sl_source: Kadarkoli sem imela težavo, sem govorila s teboj, ker si vedno dala najboljši nasvet.
595.en_source: Whenever I had a problem, I talked to you about it because you always gave the best advice.
595.sl_trans: Kadarkoli sem imel težavo, sem se o njej pogovoril s teboj, saj si mi vedno dal najboljši nasvet.

596.sl_source: Ko nama ni uspelo najti soplesalca za maturantski ples, mi je dejstvo, da sva bili v težkih časih skupaj, dalo moč.
596.en_source: When we didn't manage to find dance partners at the school prom, the fact that we were together at that difficult moment gave me strength.
596.sl_trans: Ko na šolskem maturantskem plesu nisva našla plesnih partnerjev, mi je dejstvo, da sva bila v tem težkem trenutku skupaj, dajalo moč.

598.sl_source: Če bi imela še nekaj dni, bi zagotovo našla nekoga, kot sem ga jaz, saj si občudovanja vredna oseba in imaš zelo lepe lase in prsi.
598.en_source: I'm sure that if you had a few more days, you would find someone, just like I did, because you're an admirable person, and you have very beautiful hair and very nice breasts.
598.sl_trans: Prepričan sem, da bi, če bi imela še nekaj dni časa, našla nekoga, tako kot sem ga našel jaz, saj si občudovanja vredna oseba in imaš zelo lepe lase in zelo lepe prsi.

599.sl_source: Veš, da sem ti vedno zavidala lase.
599.en_source: I was always jealous of your hair, you know that.
599.sl_trans: Vedno sem bila ljubosumna na tvoje lase, to veš.

600.sl_source: Vedno boš moja najboljša prijateljica in pogosto bom mislila nate.
600.en_source: You were, are, and always will be my best friend and I'll think of you often.
600.sl_trans: Bil si, si in vedno boš moj najboljši prijatelj in pogosto bom mislil nate.

601.sl_source: Vedno bom nosila tiste srebrne uhane, ki si mi jih podarila za rojstni dan.
601.en_source: And I'll always wear those silver earrings you gave me for my birthday.
601.sl_trans: In vedno bom nosila srebrne uhane, ki si mi jih podaril za rojstni dan.

603.sl_source: Ne glede na to, koliko novih prijateljic dobim ob povratku v mesto, ne bom našla zvestejše.
603.en_source: And however many new girlfriends I make in a few days when I move back into the city, I don't think I'll find another as true."
603.sl_trans: In ne glede na to, koliko novih prijateljic bom dobila v nekaj dneh, ko se bom preselila nazaj v mesto, mislim, da ne bom našla tako prave."

604.sl_source: Rada bi gledala Ostani z menoj z Riverjem Phoenixom, Kiefer Sutherland in Richardom Dreyfusom.
604.en_source: I'd like to watch the film Stand By Me, with River Phoenix, Kiefer Sutherland and Richard Dreyfus.
604.sl_trans: Rad bi si ogledal film Stand By Me z Riverjem Phoenixom, Kieferjem Sutherlandom in Richardom Dreyfusom.

609.sl_source: Najbrž si v kopalnici, zato ne slišiš zvonjenja.
609.en_source: You're probably in the bathroom, that's why you can't hear the phone ring.
609.sl_trans: Verjetno ste v kopalnici, zato ne slišite zvonjenja telefona.

610.sl_source: Ni ga čez hladen tuš zjutraj.
610.en_source: Nothing like a cold shower in the morning.
610.sl_trans: Nič ni lepšega kot hladen tuš zjutraj.

611.sl_source: Poklicala te bom malce pozneje, ko končaš s tuširanjem.
611.en_source: Well, I'll call you a little bit later, after you've finished your shower.
611.sl_trans: Pokličem te malo pozneje, ko se boš oprhal.

613.sl_source: Nekega dne, ko je igral golf, je spoznal, da je težje hliniti čustva, ko jih nimaš, kot pa jih skrivati, ko so prisotna.
613.en_source: One day, as he was playing golf, he thought that it is more difficult to pretend that you do have feelings when you don't than to pretend you don't have feelings when you do.
613.sl_trans: Nekega dne, ko je igral golf, je pomislil, da se je težje pretvarjati, da imaš čustva, ko jih nimaš, kot pa se pretvarjati, da jih nimaš, ko jih imaš.

614.sl_source: Prav tako je pomislil, da mu je všeč njen naglas, in kako je vedno imel raje ženske s kratkimi lasmi.
614.en_source: He also thought that he liked her accent, and he'd always preferred women with short hair.
614.sl_trans: Poleg tega se mu je zdel všeč njen naglas in vedno je imel raje ženske s kratkimi lasmi.

615.sl_source: Zato se je odločil, da je ona prava.
615.en_source: So he decided that she was the one.
615.sl_trans: Zato se je odločil, da je ona tista prava.

616.sl_source: Med lovom jo bo zasledoval, in ko ustreli samotarja, bo rekel:
616.en_source: During the hunt, he would follow her, and as soon as she shot a loner, he would say to her,
616.sl_trans: Med lovom ji je sledil, in ko je ustrelila samotarja, ji je rekel,

617.sl_source: Ko bi le imeli prave puške namesto teh smešnih za omamljanje.
617.en_source: "I wish we had real guns instead of these silly tranquiliser ones.
617.sl_trans: "Želim si, da bi imeli prave pištole in ne teh neumnih uspaval.

618.sl_source: Zakaj ga ne ubiješ z golimi rokami?
618.en_source: Why don't you kill him with your bare hands?"
618.sl_trans: Zakaj ga ne ubiješ z golimi rokami?"

619.sl_source: V trenutku, ko bi dala roke okoli samotarjevega vratu, bo rekel:
619.en_source: And the moment she puts her hands around the loner's throat, he would say,
619.sl_trans: V trenutku, ko bi mu položila roke na vrat, bi rekel,

623.en_source: She jumped from the window of room 180.

625.en_source: I hope she dies right away.

626.sl_source: Če bolje pomislim, pa upam, da bo pred tem precej trpela.
626.en_source: On second thoughts I hope she suffers quite a bit before she dies.
626.sl_trans: Po drugi strani upam, da bo pred smrtjo precej trpela.

627.sl_source: Le upam, da se njeni patetični kriki ne slišijo v mojo sobo.
627.en_source: I just hope her pathetic screams can't be heard from my room.
627.sl_trans: Upam le, da se iz moje sobe ne bo slišalo njeno žalostno kričanje.

628.sl_source: Ker sem razmišljal, da bi prilegel.
628.en_source: Because I was thinking about having a lie-down.
628.sl_trans: Ker sem razmišljal o tem, da bi se ulegel.

630.sl_source: Igral sem golf, pa sem dokaj utrujen.
630.en_source: I was playing golf and I'm quite tired.
630.sl_trans: Igral sem golf in sem precej utrujen.

631.sl_source: Res mi ni treba poslušati neke ženske umirati počasi in glasno.
631.en_source: The last thing I need is some woman dying slowly and loudly.
631.sl_trans: Zadnja stvar, ki jo potrebujem, je, da neka ženska počasi in glasno umira.

632.sl_source: Ne slišim te zaradi tega kričanja.
632.en_source: I can't hear you with all this screaming.
632.sl_trans: Zaradi vsega tega kričanja te ne slišim.

633.sl_source: Govorila bova drugič, ko bo manj hrupa.
633.en_source: We'll talk some other time when it's quieter.
633.sl_trans: Pogovorimo se kdaj drugič, ko bo mirneje.

635.sl_source: Najbrž si v kopalnici, zato ne slišiš zvonjenja.
635.en_source: Hello. You're probably in the bathroom, that's why you can't hear the phone ring.
635.sl_trans: Pozdravljeni. Verjetno si v kopalnici, zato ne slišiš zvonjenja telefona.

636.sl_source: Ni ga čez hladen tuš zjutraj.
636.en_source: Nothing like a cold shower in the morning.
636.sl_trans: Nič ni lepšega kot hladen tuš zjutraj.

637.sl_source: Poklicala te bom malce pozneje, ko končaš s tuširanjem.
637.en_source: Well, I'll call you a little bit later, after you've finished your shower.
637.sl_trans: Pokličem te malo pozneje, ko se boš oprhal.

640.en_source: I think we are a match.

642.en_source: The keys to the double room, please.

643.en_source: I wish you the best of luck.

644.en_source: We all wish you the best of luck.

645.sl_source: Običajno spiš na levi strani postelje ali desni?
645.en_source: Do you normally sleep on the left side of the bed or the right?
645.sl_trans: Ali običajno spite na levi ali desni strani postelje?

650.sl_source: Naj ugasnem luč ali bi rada še brala?
650.en_source: Should I turn off the light or would you like to read?
650.sl_trans: Naj ugasnem luč ali bi radi brali?

654.sl_source: Ne moti me svetloba ne hrup.
654.en_source: I'm not bothered by light or noise.
654.sl_trans: Svetloba in hrup me ne motita.

658.en_source: Elizabeth, give the nice man a kiss.

660.sl_source: Zadnje, kar si želim, je poljub trapaste male deklice.
660.en_source: The last thing I want right now is a kiss from a silly little girl.
660.sl_trans: Zadnja stvar, ki si jo zdaj želim, je poljub od neumne deklice.

662.sl_source: –Ne joči, morala bi se mi zahvaliti.
662.en_source: Don't cry, Elizabeth, you should thank me.
662.sl_trans: Ne joči, Elizabeth, morala bi se mi zahvaliti.

663.sl_source: Zdaj, ko šepaš, boš bolj podobna očetu.
663.en_source: Now you'll have a limp and be more like your father.
663.sl_trans: Zdaj boš hromila in boš bolj podobna svojemu očetu.

666.sl_source: Bi lahko fukala v položaju, ko ti lahko vidim obraz?
666.en_source: Do you mind if we fuck in a position where I can see your face?
666.sl_trans: Ali imaš kaj proti, če seksava v položaju, v katerem lahko vidim tvoj obraz?

668.sl_source: Prižgi luč, prosim, da te lahko bolje vidim.
668.en_source: Turn the light on please, so I can see you better.
668.sl_trans: Prižgite luč, da vas bom bolje videl.

670.sl_source: Pustila sem ga umirati zelo počasi.
670.en_source: I left him to die very slowly.
670.sl_trans: Pustil sem ga umirati zelo počasi.

671.en_source: He may not be dead yet even as we speak.
671.sl_trans: Morda še ni mrtev, čeprav se pogovarjamo.

672.en_source: I was kicking him for ages.

674.sl_source: Malce je cvilil, čudne vrste lajež.
674.en_source: He whined a little, a strange kind of bark.
674.sl_trans: Malo je skomignil, kar je bila nenavadna vrsta laježa.

676.en_source: It must have been from the pain.
676.sl_trans: Zagotovo je bilo to zaradi bolečine.

678.en_source: You really are a deep sleeper.

680.sl_trans: Z veseljem bi si jih privoščil.

681.sl_source: Samo da si umijem obraz in zobe.
681.en_source: As soon as I wash my face and brush my teeth, though.
681.sl_trans: Takoj ko si umijem obraz in umijem zobe.

682.sl_source: Komaj čakam, da slišim zgodbo, ki si mi jo sinoči obljubil.
682.en_source: I can't wait to hear the story you promised to tell me last night.
682.sl_trans: Komaj čakam, da slišim zgodbo, ki si mi jo obljubil, da mi jo boš povedal sinoči.

683.sl_source: O tistem tvojem študentu in njegovem groznem projektu.
683.en_source: The one about that student of yours at the university and his awful final project.
683.sl_trans: O tistem tvojem študentu na univerzi in njegovem groznem zaključnem projektu.

684.en_source: It's really a very funny story.
684.sl_trans: To je res zelo smešna zgodba.

685.sl_source: To niso solze, samo voda je.
685.en_source: These aren't tears, it's just water.
685.sl_trans: To niso solze, to je le voda.

688.sl_source: Ne razumem, zakaj bi to storil, ko dobro veš, da razmerje ne more sloneti na laži.
688.en_source: I can't understand why you did it, when you know as well as anyone that a relationship cannot be built on a lie.
688.sl_trans: Ne morem razumeti, zakaj si to storila, ko pa tako dobro kot vsi drugi veš, da odnosa ni mogoče graditi na laži.

689.sl_source: Takoj greva do upraviteljice hotela, da dobiš kazen, ki jo zaslužiš.
689.en_source: We're going to the hotel manager right now and you'll get the punishment you deserve.
689.sl_trans: Zdaj gremo k direktorju hotela in dobil boš kazen, ki si jo zaslužiš.

691.sl_source: Spremenijo te v žival, katera nihče noče biti.
691.en_source: They turn you into the animal no one wants to be.
691.sl_trans: Spremenijo vas v žival, ki si je nihče ne želi.

692.sl_source: Videla sem vašega partnerja teči tja.
692.en_source: I saw your partner running back that way.
692.sl_trans: Videl sem vašega partnerja, ki je tekel nazaj.

695.sl_source: Sprva jo je hotel ubiti na grozovit in boleč način, kakor je ona prizadejala njegovega brata.
695.en_source: At first he wanted to kill her in some horrible and painful way, like the death she had inflicted on his brother.
695.sl_trans: Najprej jo je želel ubiti na kakšen grozen in boleč način, kot je bila smrt, ki jo je povzročila njegovemu bratu.

697.sl_source: Razmišljal je, da bi jo v nedogled brcal v trebuh, nato pa bi jo na isto mesto zabodel.
697.en_source: He thought about kicking her in the stomach over and over again, and then stabbing her in the same spot in the stomach.
697.sl_trans: Razmišljal je, da bi jo vedno znova brcnil v trebuh in jo nato zabodel na isto mesto v trebuhu.

698.sl_source: Potem pa je spoznal, da bi bilo to povsem nesmiselno, ker je bila že brez zavesti in ne bi čutila bolečine.
698.en_source: But then he thought there wouldn't be much point, because she was already unconscious and wouldn't feel any pain from the kicks, or the knife.
698.sl_trans: Toda potem je pomislil, da to nima smisla, saj je že nezavestna in ne bo čutila bolečine ne zaradi udarcev ne zaradi noža.

699.sl_source: Ustreliti me morate, da ne posumijo, da sem vam pomagala.
699.en_source: You have to shoot me so they won't suspect I helped you.
699.sl_trans: Ustreliti me moraš, da ne bodo posumili, da sem ti pomagal.

700.sl_source: Sobarica mu je pomagala, ni pa razumel, zakaj je to naredila.
700.en_source: A hotel maid helped him. He couldn't understand why she did it.
700.sl_trans: Pomagala mu je hotelska sobarica. Ni mogel razumeti, zakaj je to storila.

701.sl_source: Odločil se je, da jo spremeni v žival.
701.en_source: So he decided to turn her into an animal.
701.sl_trans: Zato se je odločil, da jo bo spremenil v žival.

702.sl_source: Zvlekel jo je v sobo, kjer se opravljajo preobrazbe.
702.en_source: He dragged her to the room where the transformations took place.
702.sl_trans: Vlekel jo je v sobo, kjer so potekale preobrazbe.

703.sl_source: Velikokrat sem ga vprašala, v katero žival jo je spremenil, a mi je vedno odvrnil enako:
703.en_source: I asked him many times what sort of animal he turned her into, but he always gave me the same answer:
703.sl_trans: Večkrat sem ga vprašal, v kakšno žival jo je spremenil, a mi je vedno odgovoril enako:

705.sl_source: Tisto noč je zapustil hotel za vselej.
705.en_source: That night, he left the hotel once and for all.
705.sl_trans: Tisto noč je dokončno zapustil hotel.

706.sl_source: Spustil se je v tek, ne vedoč, kam ga vodi pot.
706.en_source: He began to run without knowing where he was headed.
706.sl_trans: Začel je teči, ne da bi vedel, kam gre.

707.sl_source: Toda pot ga je vodila k nam.
707.en_source: But he was headed towards us.

709.sl_source: Takrat še ni vedel, kako močno boli biti sam.
709.en_source: And back then, he didn't know how much it hurts to be alone.
709.sl_trans: Takrat še ni vedel, kako zelo boli biti sam.

710.sl_source: Kako boli, ko si ne moreš namazati hrbta z mazilom proti bolečini in trpiš neprestano bol.
710.en_source: How much it hurts when you cannot reach to rub pain-relief ointment on your back, and you are constantly in pain.
710.sl_trans: Kako zelo vas boli, ko si ne morete doseči, da bi si hrbet namazali z mazilom proti bolečinam, in vas nenehno boli.

711.en_source: I found him in the woods.

713.en_source: Are you a doctor, by any chance?

716.sl_source: Imeli smo enega, a so ga ujeli pred meseci.
716.en_source: We had one, but they caught him a couple of months ago.
716.sl_trans: Imeli smo enega, a so ga ujeli pred nekaj meseci.

720.sl_source: Pri nas lahko ostaneš kolikor želiš.
720.en_source: You can stay with us for as long as you like.
720.sl_trans: Pri nas lahko ostanete, kolikor časa želite.

721.en_source: You can be a loner until the day you die.

723.sl_source: Mimogrede, romantična ali spolna razmerja med samotarji niso dovoljena.
723.en_source: By the way, any romantic or sexual relations between loners are not permitted.
723.sl_trans: Mimogrede, kakršni koli romantični ali spolni odnosi med samotarji niso dovoljeni.

724.en_source: And any such acts are punished.

726.en_source: Can I have a conversation with someone?
726.sl_trans: Ali se lahko z nekom pogovarjam?

728.sl_source: Da le ne gre za spogledovanje ali kaj podobnega.
728.en_source: So as long as there is no flirting or anything like that.
728.sl_trans: Dokler ni flirtanja ali česa podobnega.

730.sl_source: Vsi plešemo sami, zato predvajamo le elektronsko glasbo.
730.en_source: We all dance by ourselves, that's why we only play electronic music.
730.sl_trans: Vsi plešemo sami, zato igramo samo elektronsko glasbo.

731.sl_source: Kaj se je zgodilo s tvojimi usti?
731.sl_trans: Kaj se je zgodilo z vašimi usti?

733.sl_source: Dan mu je bil rdeči poljub.
733.en_source: He was given the Red Kiss.

735.sl_source: Razrežemo mu ustnice z britvico in ustnice drugega samotarja, nato ju prisilimo, da se poljubita.
735.en_source: We slashed his lips with a razor and the lips of another loner, and we forced them to kiss each other.
735.sl_trans: Z britvico smo mu razrezali ustnice in ustnice drugega samotarja ter ju prisilili, da sta se poljubila.

736.en_source: That was a couple of days ago now.
736.sl_trans: To je bilo pred nekaj dnevi.

737.sl_source: Ureznine so bile globoke, zato še vedno čutita bolečino.
737.en_source: But the cuts were deep and they're still in pain.
737.sl_trans: Vendar so bile rane globoke in še vedno jih bolijo.

740.sl_source: Da vam odsekajo palec je huje, kot če vam obrijejo glavo.
740.en_source: Having your thumb cut is worse than having your head shaved.
740.sl_trans: Odrezan palec je hujše kot obrita glava.

741.sl_source: In kuhano jajce pod pazduho je huje od brce v nogo.
741.en_source: And having a hot boiled egg under your armpit is worse than having your leg kicked.
741.sl_trans: In imeti vroče kuhano jajce pod pazduho je hujše od tega, da te brcnejo v nogo.

742.sl_source: Kazni, ki se je bojim jaz, ni rdeči poljub, ampak druga, ki se imenuje rdeče občevanje.
742.en_source: The punishment I am afraid of isn't the Red Kiss but another one, that is called the Red Intercourse.
742.sl_trans: Kazen, ki se je bojim, ni rdeči poljub, ampak druga kazen, ki se imenuje rdeči spolni odnos.

743.sl_source: Nisem je še videla izvajane, a si ni težko predstavljati pomena.
743.en_source: I have never seen it happen, but it's not difficult to imagine what it means.
743.sl_trans: Tega še nisem videl, vendar si ni težko predstavljati, kaj to pomeni.

744.en_source: Oh, my God, I am so afraid of it.
744.sl_trans: O, moj bog, tako zelo se ga bojim.

749.en_source: That was the first time I saw him.

752.sl_source: Naslednji dan je v mestu odkril, da sem tudi jaz kratkovidna.
752.en_source: The next day, in the city, he found out that I was short-sighted too.
752.sl_trans: Naslednji dan je v mestu ugotovil, da sem tudi jaz kratkoviden.

753.sl_source: Tisto noč sem sanjala, da živiva v veliki hiši v mestu, z veliko in osvetljeno kuhinjo.
753.en_source: That night in my sleep, I dreamt that we lived in a big house together in the city, with a large well-lit kitchen.
753.sl_trans: Tisto noč sem v spanju sanjal, da sva skupaj živela v veliki hiši v mestu z veliko in dobro osvetljeno kuhinjo.

754.sl_source: Nosila sem temno modre hlače in ozko krem bluzo.
754.en_source: I was wearing dark blue trousers and a tight cream blouse.
754.sl_trans: Oblečena sem bila v temno modre hlače in oprijeto kremno bluzo.

755.sl_source: Slekel me je in pofukal v zadnjico.
755.en_source: And he took my clothes off and fucked me up the arse.
755.sl_trans: Slekel mi je oblačila in me zajebal v rit.

756.sl_source: Ko me je fukal, je v kuhinjo vdrl ropar, vzel nož iz drugega predala in naju napadel.
756.en_source: And as he was fucking me, a thug came into the kitchen, and took the steak knives from the second draw and attacked us.
756.sl_trans: In ko me je zajebal, je v kuhinjo prišel kriminalec, vzel nože za steak iz drugega predala in naju napadel.

757.sl_source: Zabadal je nož v najina trebuha enega za drugim.
757.en_source: He was stabbing the knives into our bellies one by one.
757.sl_trans: Nože je enega za drugim zabadal v naše trebuhe.

761.sl_source: Veš, da bi moral biti pazljivejši.
761.en_source: You know you should have been more careful.
761.sl_trans: Veš, da bi moral biti bolj previden.

762.sl_source: Boj se potrudi, sicer te bodo našli in spremenili v neko šibko žival.
762.en_source: Try harder or they'll find you and you'll be turned into an animal - a weak one.
762.sl_trans: Potrudite se še bolj, sicer vas bodo našli in spremenili vas bodo v žival - šibko žival.

763.en_source: We must get a move on now.

764.en_source: It's really too dangerous to stay here.
764.sl_trans: Res je preveč nevarno, da bi ostali tukaj.

765.sl_source: Če se ti uspe osvoboditi, teci, kakor hitro moreš in nas poišči.
765.en_source: If you manage to free yourself, run as fast as you can and come find us.
765.sl_trans: Če se boste osvobodili, čim hitreje zbežite in nas poiščite.

766.sl_source: Če se osvobodiš in misliš, da boš izkrvavel, pojdi naravnost v svoj grob.
766.en_source: If you manage to free yourself but think you'll die from the bleeding, go straight to your grave.
766.sl_trans: Če se vam uspe osvoboditi, vendar menite, da boste umrli zaradi krvavitve, pojdite naravnost v grob.

767.en_source: Have you dug your own grave?

769.en_source: I'm going to go hunting for truffles.
769.sl_trans: Šel bom na lov za tartufi.

771.en_source: A kilo can fetch a lot of money.
771.sl_trans: Za kilogram lahko iztržite veliko denarja.

772.en_source: You're going to need a pig.

775.en_source: Gotta get them back in 50 minutes. - OK.
775.sl_trans: V 50 minutah jih moraš vrniti. - V REDU.

778.sl_source: Kar si naredil tisti ženski je grozno.
778.en_source: What you did to that woman was dreadful.
778.sl_trans: To, kar ste storili tej ženski, je bilo strašno.

780.sl_source: Isto bi storil, če bi ubila tebe.
780.en_source: I would have done the same thing if she'd killed you.
780.sl_trans: Enako bi storil, če bi te ubila.

781.en_source: You're like a brother to me.

782.en_source: Oh, you're my best friend in the whole world.
782.sl_trans: Si moja najboljša prijateljica na vsem svetu.

783.sl_source: Ne bi rekel, da sem tvoj najboljši prijatelj.
783.en_source: I don't think I'm your best friend in the whole world.
783.sl_trans: Mislim, da nisem tvoja najboljša prijateljica na vsem svetu.

784.sl_source: Veliko več časa si prebil z Johnom.
784.en_source: You used to spend much more time with John.
784.sl_trans: Z Johnom si včasih preživel veliko več časa.

787.sl_source: Še njegovega imena se ne spomnim.
787.en_source: Oh, yeah. I didn't even remember his name.
787.sl_trans: Oh, ja. Nisem se spomnil niti njegovega imena.

789.sl_source: Nate vedno pomislim, ko potrebujem prijatelja.
789.en_source: You're the one I think of whenever I need a friend.
789.sl_trans: Nate pomislim vedno, ko potrebujem prijatelja.

790.sl_trans: Pa vendar, ali je Johnu uspelo?

791.en_source: They're getting ready for the yacht.
791.sl_trans: Pripravljajo se na plovbo z jahto.

793.sl_source: Vsi pravijo, da bosta uspela, ker se odlično ujemata.
793.en_source: Everyone says they're gonna make it as they're perfectly suited for each other.
793.sl_trans: Vsi pravijo, da jima bo uspelo, saj se odlično ujemata.

794.sl_source: Otrok jima bo pomagal skozi nesoglasja in prepire.
794.en_source: The child will help them get past the fighting and arguing.
794.sl_trans: Otrok jima bo pomagal preseči prepir in prepiranje.

796.en_source: You're not thinking about coming back?

797.sl_source: Če upraviteljici poveš za brata, bi ti najbrž oprostila.
797.en_source: You know, if you told the hotel manager about your brother, she'd probably forgive you.
797.sl_trans: Veste, če bi direktorici hotela povedal o svojem bratu, bi ti verjetno odpustila.

798.sl_source: Ne, res je lepo biti na svojem.
798.en_source: No, it's really nice to be on your own.
798.sl_trans: Ne, res je lepo biti sam.

799.en_source: There's no one tying you down.

800.sl_source: Poslušaš glasbo, ko se ti zahoče, masturbiraš, ko se ti zahoče, greš na sprehod, ko se ti zahoče, klepetaš, ko se ti zahoče.
800.en_source: You listen to music whenever you like, you masturbate whenever you want, go for walks whenever you like, have a chat whenever you like.
800.sl_trans: Poslušate glasbo, kadarkoli želite, masturbirate, kadarkoli želite, se sprehajate, kadarkoli želite, se pogovarjate, kadarkoli želite.

801.en_source: I don't miss companionship at all.

802.sl_source: Samo tebe pogrešam, ker si bil edini pravi prijatelj.
802.en_source: I just miss you, 'cause you were my one true friend.
802.sl_trans: Pogrešam te, ker si bil moj edini pravi prijatelj.

805.sl_source: Samo dva dneva sta mi ostala.
805.en_source: I only have two days left.
805.sl_trans: Ostajata mi le še dva dni.

807.en_source: I can't understand the way you speak.

809.sl_source: Le dva dneva sta mi ostala, potrebujem več časa.
809.en_source: I only have two days left, I need more time.
809.sl_trans: Imam le še dva dni, potrebujem več časa.

810.sl_source: Res verjameš, da bo dodaten dan kaj spremenil?
810.en_source: Do you actually believe another day will make a difference?
810.sl_trans: Ali res verjamete, da bo še en dan kaj spremenil?

811.en_source: Have you seen how ugly you are?

814.sl_source: Ne povej nikomur, da sem ti pomagala.
814.en_source: Don't tell anyone I helped you.
814.sl_trans: Nikomur ne povej, da sem ti pomagal.

815.sl_source: Če se mi hočeš oddolžiti, je način.
815.en_source: If you want to repay me, there is a way.
815.sl_trans: Če se mi želite oddolžiti, obstaja način.

816.sl_source: Če ubiješ zajca, mi ga prinesi za pojest.
816.en_source: If you kill a rabbit, bring it to me to eat.
816.sl_trans: Če ubiješ zajca, mi ga prinesi, da ga bom pojedel.

817.sl_source: Z ostrim nožem si skrbno odrl zajca in mu odsekal glavo.
817.en_source: You carefully flay the rabbit with a sharp knife and cut off its head.
817.sl_trans: Z ostrim nožem zajca previdno odrežite in mu odrežite glavo.

818.sl_source: Nato si razparal trebuh in ga nadeval z rdečo in zeleno papriko.
818.en_source: You then slice open its belly and stuff it with well-washed red and green peppers.
818.sl_trans: Nato mu razrežite trebuh in ga napolnite z dobro oprano rdečo in zeleno papriko.

820.sl_source: Nato si ga potopil v limonin sok in pustil nekaj časa marinirati, preden si ga nabodel na raženj in vrtel nad ognjem eno uro.
820.en_source: You then soak it in lemon juice and leave it a while to marinate the flesh before you skewer it on a stick and roast it over the fire for about an hour.
820.sl_trans: Nato ga namočite v limonin sok in pustite nekaj časa, da se meso marinira, preden ga nabodete na nabodalo in približno eno uro pečete na ognju.

821.sl_source: To je moja najljubša jed, zajec.
821.sl_trans: To je moja najljubša hrana, zajec.

823.sl_source: Poročno potrdilo je izteklo pred dvema mesecema.
823.en_source: Marriage certificate expired two months ago.
823.sl_trans: Poročni list je potekel pred dvema mesecema.

824.sl_source: Moj mož je na službeni poti.
824.en_source: My husband's away on a business trip.
824.sl_trans: Moj mož je na službenem potovanju.

826.sl_source: Nima umazanije pod nohti ali blata na čevljih.
826.en_source: No dirt under her nails or mud on her shoes.
826.sl_trans: Brez umazanije pod nohti ali blata na čevljih.

831.sl_source: Ne, tu sem s svojo partnerico.
831.en_source: No, I'm here with my partner.
831.sl_trans: Ne, tu sem s svojim partnerjem.

832.sl_source: Trenutno nakupuje v eni od trgovin.
832.en_source: She's inside one of the stores, shopping right now.
832.sl_trans: Zdaj je v eni od trgovin in nakupuje.

833.en_source: Can I see your certificate, please?

834.en_source: My partner keeps it in her purse.
834.sl_trans: Moja partnerka ga hrani v torbici.

835.en_source: You see, I am losing it all the time.
835.sl_trans: Vidiš, ves čas mi gre na živce.

836.en_source: And what store is she shopping in?

839.sl_source: Zelo velik izbor mazil proti bolečini so imeli.
839.en_source: They had such a huge variety of pain-relief ointment.
839.sl_trans: Imeli so ogromno različnih mazil za lajšanje bolečin.

841.en_source: I hope it's the one you were looking for.
841.sl_trans: Upam, da je to tista, ki ste jo iskali.

843.en_source: Can I have my certificate, please?

845.en_source: Would you like to see mine also, Officer?
845.sl_trans: Bi radi videli tudi mojega, častnik?

846.sl_source: Ne bo treba, v redu je.

851.sl_source: Če hodim prepočasi, samo povej, pa bom pospešil.
851.en_source: If I'm walking too slowly, just say, and I'll pick up my pace.
851.sl_trans: Če hodim prepočasi, samo povejte in pospešil bom korak.

853.sl_source: Morda le malce popusti stisk, dlan se mi začenja potiti.
853.en_source: Maybe don't squeeze my hand so tightly, my palm's getting a little sweaty.
853.sl_trans: Mogoče mi ne stiskaj tako močno roke, ker se mi dlan že malo poti.

857.sl_source: Nameravaš kupiti kaj lepega zase, ko smo tukaj?
857.en_source: Are you planning on buying anything else nice for yourself while we're here?
857.sl_trans: Si nameravaš kupiti še kaj lepega zase, medtem ko smo tukaj?

858.sl_source: Ja, raztopino za kontaktne leče in Parkerjev kemični.
858.en_source: Yes, contact lens solution and a Parker Rollerball.
858.sl_trans: Da, raztopina za kontaktne leče in pisalo Parker Rollerball.

859.en_source: I didn't know you were short-sighted.

864.en_source: Tomorrow I'm going away on a business trip.

865.sl_source: Vaš, kako zahtevno je moje delo.
865.en_source: You know how demanding my job is.
865.sl_trans: Veste, kako zahtevno je moje delo.

866.sl_source: Ne sprašuj me tega vsakič, ko pridem.
866.en_source: Don't ask if I can stay a few days every time I come.
866.sl_trans: Ne sprašujte me, ali lahko vsakič, ko pridem, ostanem nekaj dni.

867.en_source: Do you all work for the same company?
867.sl_trans: Ali vsi delate za isto podjetje?

868.sl_source: Hčerka mi pravi, da je to odlično podjetje.
868.en_source: My daughter says me it's a very fine company.
868.sl_trans: Hčerka pravi, da je to zelo dobro podjetje.

872.en_source: One of the best, I'd say.
872.sl_trans: Rekel bi, da je eden najboljših.

874.sl_source: Edina težava z delom je, da nimam dovolj časa za ženo in otroke.
874.en_source: The only problem with the job is that I don't have enough time for my wife and kids.
874.sl_trans: Edina težava tega dela je, da nimam dovolj časa za ženo in otroke.

876.sl_source: Četudi ne bi imela otrok, ne bi niti v sanjah zapustil žene.
876.en_source: But even if we'd never had children, I would never dream of leaving my wife.
876.sl_trans: Toda tudi če ne bi imela otrok, ne bi niti v sanjah zapustil svoje žene.

877.sl_source: Četudi bi bila midva sama, bi šla na potovanja.
877.en_source: Even if it was just the two of us, on our own, we'd go on trips.
877.sl_trans: Tudi če sva bila samo midva sama, sva šla na izlet.

878.sl_source: Šla bi v Portofino v Italiji ali na Grške otoke čez poletje.
878.en_source: We'd go to Portofino in Italy or go to a Greek island for the summer.
878.sl_trans: Odšli bi v Portofino v Italiji ali poleti na grški otok.

879.sl_source: Tako bi bilo najino razmerje močno kot na začetku.
879.en_source: And so our relationship would be as intense as it was at the start.
879.sl_trans: Tako bo najin odnos še naprej tako intenziven, kot je bil na začetku.

880.sl_source: Svojo ženo tako ljubim, da bi umrl zanjo.
880.en_source: I love my wife so much I could die for her.
880.sl_trans: Svojo ženo imam tako rad, da bi zanjo lahko umrl.

881.en_source: That's how much I love her.

882.sl_source: Odlično si opravil za svoj prvi obisk mesta.
882.en_source: For your first day in the city, you did great.
882.sl_trans: Za prvi dan v mestu vam je šlo odlično.

883.sl_source: Tisti del o počitniških destinacijah na Mediteranu je bil sijajen.
883.en_source: That part about holiday destinations in the Mediterranean was brilliant.
883.sl_trans: Tisti del o počitniških destinacijah v Sredozemlju je bil odličen.

888.sl_source: Katere znamke so bila tvoja prva očala?
888.en_source: What was the make of your first pair of glasses?
888.sl_trans: Kakšna je bila znamka vaših prvih očal?

891.sl_source: Želiš, da ti malce namažem hrbet z balzamom?
891.en_source: Would you like me to rub some balm on your back?
891.sl_trans: Želite, da vam namažem hrbet z balzamom?

892.sl_source: Po predelih, ki jih ne dosežeš sam?
892.en_source: On the bits you can't reach on your own?
892.sl_trans: Na delih, ki jih ne morete doseči sami?

898.en_source: The room numbers are as follows:

899.en_source: the hotel manager and her partner.

900.en_source: They both, they both have nice voices.

901.en_source: couple who both love to ski.

902.en_source: couple who both studied social sciences.

903.sl_source: Na jahti Bliss je par, ki je nagnjen h krvavitvam iz nosu.
903.en_source: Name of yacht Bliss: couple prone to nosebleeds."
903.sl_trans: Ime jahte Bliss: par nagnjen h krvavitvi iz nosu."

907.en_source: And you two, take the yacht.

908.en_source: Can I go to the yacht?

909.en_source: OK, then, so you take the yacht.

911.sl_source: Mi trije pa bomo vzeli upraviteljičino sobo.
911.en_source: And us three, we'll take the manager's room.
911.sl_trans: Mi trije pa bomo zasedli sobo direktorja.

913.en_source: You need to speak with the manager.

916.en_source: Sit in that seat over there.

917.en_source: Put your hand behind your back.

918.sl_source: Košarkarska žoga tehta med 550 in 650 grami.
918.en_source: A basketball weighs between 550 and 650 grams.
918.sl_trans: Košarkarska žoga tehta od 550 do 650 gramov.

921.sl_source: Teža se razlikuje za moške in ženske ekipe, a toliko približno tehtajo.
921.en_source: The weight's different for men's and women's games, but that's roughly how much it weighs.
921.sl_trans: Teža je različna za moške in ženske igre, vendar približno toliko tehta.

922.sl_source: Veš, koliko tehta žoga za odbojko?
922.en_source: Do you know how much a volleyball weighs?

923.en_source: No, but I'd like to find out.
923.sl_trans: Ne, vendar bi to rad izvedel.

925.en_source: I have something to tell you.

927.sl_source: Zabija ga ob zid, kos trdega lesa ali kaj podobnega.
927.en_source: He bangs it against a wall or a piece of hard wood, or something like that.
927.sl_trans: Z njim udarja ob steno, kos trdega lesa ali kaj podobnega.

928.sl_source: Ali ga poreže z žepnim nožem, ko ne gledaš.
928.en_source: Or he cuts it with a penknife when you're not looking.
928.sl_trans: Ali pa ga reže s kuhinjskim nožem, ko te ne gleda.

932.sl_source: Dokaj sem prepričan, da madež na njegovi majici ni kri, pač pa češnjev sok, kečap, rdeča barva ali kaj takega.
932.en_source: And, and I'm quite sure that stain on his T-shirt isn't blood, but cherry juice or tomato ketchup or red watercolour paint or something like that.
932.sl_trans: In prepričan sem, da madež na njegovi majici ni kri, ampak češnjev sok ali paradižnikov kečap ali rdeča akvarelna barva ali kaj podobnega.

933.sl_source: Ali pa sok od sladkorne pese.

936.sl_source: Na lestvici od 1 do 15, kako močno jo ljubiš?
936.en_source: How much do you love her, on a scale of 1 to 15?
936.sl_trans: Kako zelo jo imate radi na lestvici od 1 do 15?

938.en_source: He loves her very much indeed.

939.en_source: Who do you think we should kill?
939.sl_trans: Koga bi po vašem mnenju morali ubiti?

940.sl_source: Kateri bo lahko živel bolje sam?
940.en_source: Who will be able to live on their own better?
940.sl_trans: Kdo bo lahko bolje živel sam?

943.en_source: You'd better get out while you still can.
943.sl_trans: Raje se umaknite, dokler še lahko.

944.en_source: That's all I came to say, anyway.
944.sl_trans: To je vse, kar sem želel povedati.

945.sl_source: Če ta ženska umre, meniš, da boš zmogel sam ali pa boš potreboval nekoga drugega?
945.en_source: You. If this woman dies, d'you think you'll manage on your own? Or will you get involved with someone else?
945.sl_trans: Vi. Če ta ženska umre, misliš, da boš zmogel sam? Ali se boš zapletel z nekom drugim?

946.sl_source: Jaz lahko živim sam, ona ne more.
946.en_source: I can live alone, she can't.
946.sl_trans: Jaz lahko živim sam, ona ne.

947.sl_source: Po cele ure preživim sam, ko ona vodi hotel.
947.en_source: I'm on my own for hours when she's running the hotel.
947.sl_trans: Ko ona vodi hotel, sem več ur sama.

948.en_source: I like sitting in the room.

951.en_source: I can definitely live on my own.

955.en_source: I'm going to fucking kill your arse.

956.sl_trans: Ali vam je za to čisto vseeno?
